alert.note: Alert for Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 01 at 1:54AM EDT until April 01 at 2:30AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 AM EDT FOR DELAWARE AND UNION COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO... At 153 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Upper Sandusky to near Mechanicsburg, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Dublin, Delaware, Marysville, Powell, Plain City, Richwood, Ashley, New California, Radnor, Milford Center, Shawnee Hills, Ostrander, Magnetic Springs, Unionville Center, Alum Creek State Park, Delaware State Park, Broadway, US Route 33 at US Route 42, Warrensburg and Kilbourne. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
